responses: Hey there! How can I help?
I am still here, but not following. Could you elaborate?
I can tell you about our organization, JiaTing!
I can give you information about what our org does!
I can answer any FAQs about our org!

patterns: What can you tell me about JiaTing
What do you know about JiaTing
What do you know about JiaTing
responses: JiaTing is an all-inclusive cultural and leadership based organization that aims to promote traditional/modern lion and dragon dance through training and performance.

patterns: Give me some facts about JiaTing
Give me some info about JiaTing
Tell me something interesting about JiaTing
responses: Membership and training priority is given to students of the local Chinese Gainesville School, University of Florida, and Santa Fe college
JiaTing seeks to support a greater understanding of Asian heritage in the Gainesville community and is open to all members regardless of previous experience or background.
The JiaTing team originates from the University of Florida's Chinese American Student Association (CASA)
JiaTing is currently selling jerseys for $27!
Some occasions we plan to perform in: promo videos, competitions, conventions, business grand openings, show exhibitions/acts, weddings, and photoshoots!
